text:
@NikkiHaley In America 137,000 AMERICANS have died from the COVID-19 Outbreak. 48,000,000 new unemployment claims for the last 16 weeks under the Trump Administration.  

DO YOU WANT TO CONTINUE TO PLAY THIS GAME OF POLITICS OR ACTUALLY COME UP SOLUTIONS TO PROBLEMS SUCH AS POLICE BRUTALITY?
